:::Bluestreak/Andromeda/Ratchet:::

Bluestreak: We'll have to wait Andromeda.  That alright?
Andromeda: Its fine, ive been waiting for battle!
::Bluestreak throws 5 knives at Savage, and Andromeda shoots 2 wrist missles. 
 Ratchet stops his work and runs at Savage, firing 25 rapid fire shots::
Ratchet: You are NOT ruining my hard work you overgrown lizard!
